content: this little buddy works up fairly quickly with minimal sewing for the ears horns & snout you will need to know the basics stitches used magic_ring - magic_ring chain - chain st s - stitch es slip_stitch - slip_stitch single_crochet - single_crochet half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet increase - increase decrease - decrease flo - front loop only blo - back loop only tcbs - treble_crochet bobble stitch
